title: Wear Sensor Info
summary: Now you can readout the sensors of your mobile and android wear
description: Do you know what your sensors measure?Now you can readout the most of the Sensors of your device for free!Here a quick overview of the sensors used:http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/sensors/sensors_overview.htmlIf you want to improve this App send me an e-mail, pls.You can send me new App-Ideas, too.Here you can join the Beta-Testing circle:https://play.google.com/apps/testing/de.masterglancedev.readsensorsThere is no warranty at any kind especially for destroyed sensors or other issues.
descriptionHTML:
Do you know what your sensors measure?
Now you can readout the most of the Sensors of your device for free!

Here a quick overview of the sensors used:
http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/sensors/sensors_overview.html

If you want to improve this App send me an e-mail, pls.
You can send me new App-Ideas, too.

Here you can join the Beta-Testing circle:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/de.masterglancedev.readsensors

There is no warranty at any kind especially for destroyed sensors or other issues.
comments: Works well on LG G watch R with wear 2.0.  Accelerometer scaling can possibly be upped a bit, but that's nitpicking. Thanks!
No unnecessary rights needed. App needs only access to sensors. No addressbooks needed. Very seldom, today
recentChanges: I would be glad about feedback of the App:D
